definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: We could go get a bowl of fish balls and wash it down with a sour plum drink.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以去喝一碗魚丸湯，然後用酸梅汁將它消化掉。

sentences.english: Mash pickled plums, mix well with remaining seasoning and chopped ginger.
sentences.chinese: 壓爛梅子，拌入其餘酸梅汁材料及姜茸。

sentences.english: Fill baby pigeon with pickled plums and brown sugar.
sentences.chinese: 將酸梅及片糖釀入乳鴿內。

sentences.english: The doctor told Charles to drink a large glass of prune juice every day to help his constipation.
sentences.chinese: 醫生告訴查爾斯每天喝一大杯酸梅汁能改善便祕。

sentences.english: In the lazy summer afternoon, drinking a glass of plum juice, turning a few pages of picture books.
sentences.chinese: 在慵懶的夏日午後，喝一杯酸梅汁，翻幾頁繪本。

sentences.english: I have already drink 4 bottles of syrup of plum till now , i want to know why?
sentences.chinese: 到現在爲止，我已經喝了4瓶酸梅湯了，這麼渴爲啥？

definition: hawthorn tree (rose family, genus Crataegus)/rose hip (hawthorn fruit)
food preserved in sugar or honey
